definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: He is expected to be arraigned this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上他可能會被提訊。

sentences.english: The police interrogated the suspected criminal for the third time today.
sentences.chinese: 今天警方第三次提訊了這個嫌犯。

sentences.english: The suspects were waiting to be arraigned late Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 這些嫌疑人正等待提訊。

to re-investigate/to investigate and reconsider a judgment
to raise a charge/to sue/to institute proceedings
